Articles.Content:
Though wise men at their end know dark is right,

Because their words had forked no lightning they

Do not go gentle into that good night.

Lets keep it going

Good men, the last wave by, crying how bright

Their frail deeds might have danced in a green bay,

Rage, rage against the dying of the light.

okay

Wild men who caught and sang the sun in flight,

And learn, too late, they grieved it on its way,

Do not go gentle into that good night.

I was ninja-ed

Out of the night that covers me,

Black as the pit from pole to pole,

I thank whatever gods may be

For my unconquerable soul.

*cough* *spit* *sputter*

Grave men, near death, who see with blinding sight

Blind eyes could blaze like meteors and be gay,

Rage, rage against the dying of the light.

gotta love this poem

And you, my father, there on the sad height,

Curse, bless, me now with your fierce tears, I pray.

Do not go gentle into that good night.

Rage, rage against the dying of the light.

Rock on to everyone that posted a verse, rep to all.

EDIT: nvm on rep, out for 24 hours (and didnt even get a last hit on GIC:()
You fools just summoned white iron crown. the reckter of all forums.

You fools just summoned white iron crown. the reckter of all forums.

White is usually the color of surrender, this could mean that GIC was originally a surrender-crown to the RIC and got sick of it, and bathed himself in Green paint and negrep.

As battle's end looms nigh,

The cleansing white doth shine

Luminous as the sunlit sky,

Driving evil from the shrine.

Now watch the crippled foe,

Driven from his lofty perch,

Fading in the ivoried glow;

His final breath doth lurch.

From nothing I came, the mirror image of myself a cruel lie, leaving me to wallow in impropriety.

To nothing I go, my existence unneeded, to be cast aside when no longer of value.

My desires unheard in the void, as has been and will be the desires of all, in time.

From nothing I came, the mirror image of myself a cruel lie, leaving me to wallow in impropriety.

To nothing I go, my existence unneeded, to be cast aside when no longer of value.

My desires unheard in the void, as has been and will be the desires of all, in time.

You know you could just stop making posts so that no one has any way to rep you.
Just 27 points left to go!

The battle is coming to a close; however we are in a war.

Green rep, Red, and Latin. Those were our fighting tools.

But green will fade into white, and Red and Blue and White will Collide,

And a few other colors will be along for the ride. The crown will be black, it will be bad.

But the others will save us, and we will win!

Edited January 24, 2015 by RAINCRAFTER

And to the charge we shall go one last time, this is the last stand, the final show!
